Inspiration for your next holiday

About this page...

Welcome, my name is Lauren, and you have stumbled across my travel blog! Here, you'll find highlights from my travels across Asia, Europe, and United States (US). I've been lucky enough to travel a lot growing up, and plan on continuing this as I get older. Travels so far have been with friends and family, but also my furbaby (solo trip pending)!

Interested in city life? Living off grid? Sources of adrenaline? or travelling with your pet? If so, you're in the right place!

My travels to date...

Japan

Japan has a lot of things to offer, from busy bustling cities to the serene countyside. Indugle in the food available and explore querky shops.

Kawaguchiko, Kyoto, Osaka, Tokyo

Europe

Europe provides a perfect opportunity to easily cross country borders, and explore and experience a multitude of cultures.

France, Germany, Italy, Portugal, Spain

United Kingdom

Destinations which are a stone's throw away from your doorstop, perfect for nature lovers or golf enthusiasts.

England, Scotland, Wales

United States

Depending on the state, you'll have the opportunity to stroll around busy cities, hike at national or state parks, or relax on a tropical beach.

California, Florida, Oregon
